title: Calories in MOD Pizza
meta_description: Discover calories in mod pizza for a standard 11-inch Mod size, including macros, sodium, and tweaks for custom buildsâ€”perfect for tracking your pizza intake.
assumptions: 11-inch Mod size pizza with thin crust, red sauce, mozzarella cheese, and standard toppings (e.g., pepperoni); no extra customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact toppings, crust type, size, and preparation at MOD Pizza locations. Check their app or menu for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A standard MOD Mod pizza contains about 820 kcal with balanced macros for a satisfying meal.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a mod pizza from MOD?
faqs.a: Approximately 820 kcal for a standard 11-inch Mod pizza with typical toppings.

faqs.q: What are the macros for calories in mod pizza?
faqs.a: About 92 g carbs, 36 g protein, 36 g fat, including 16 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Is mod pizza high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1850 mg sodium per pizza due to cheese, sauce, and toppings.

faqs.q: How do custom toppings affect calories in mod pizza?
faqs.a: Meats and cheeses add 50-150 kcal; veggies and lighter options reduce by 50-100 kcal.

faqs.q: Calories in mod pizza vs. mini size?
faqs.a: Mod (11-inch) is ~820 kcal; mini (6-inch) is roughly half at 400-500 kcal.
